___next.description: url to get the next set of items
___next.title: next

___previous.description: url to get the previous set of items
___previous.title: previous

___currency.description: The account's currency code i.e. KES, UGX
___currency.title: currency

___status.description: The account's status. One of: active or inactive
___status.title: status

___updated_by.description: The ID of the user who last updated the account
___updated_by.title: updated_by

___author.description: The ID of the user who created the account
___author.title: author

___organization.description: The ID of the organization that the account belongs to. (This is usually your organization ID)
___organization.title: organization

___modified.description: The date that the account was lased modified, in the UTC timezone. Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ
___modified.title: modified

___created.description: The date that the account was created, in the UTC timezone. Format: YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ
___created.title: created
